instruction: Generate a story with a beginning and an ending that is 100 words long.
output: Once upon a time, there was a brave knight named Jack who wanted to make a name for himself. He set out on a dangerous quest to slay a dragon and prove himself worthy of the title of hero. With sword in hand, Jack traveled day and night until he arrived at the cave of the dragon. After a long and intense battle, Jack emerged victorious! Word of his heroism spread throughout the kingdom and no one ever again dared to challenge his courage. Jack had made his name and was remembered for generations to come.
